name: Modules.Cloud.Chats
summary: Provides methods for accessing ArrowDB chat messages.

methods.name: create
methods.summary: Send a chat message to another user or a group of users.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Chats: Create a Chat Message for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the chats property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: getChatGroups
methods.summary: Retrieve a list of chat groups the current user belongs to.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Chats: List Chat Groups for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the chat_groups property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: query
methods.summary: Retrieve a list of chat messages with sorting and pagination.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Chats: Custom Query Chat Messages for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the chats property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: queryChatGroups
methods.summary: Retrieve a list of chat groups with sorting and pagination.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Chats: Query Chat Groups for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the chat_groups property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: remove
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Chats: Delete a Chat Message for the request parameters supported by this method.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
